n_threads.description: Number of CPU threads to use

f16_kv.description: Whether to use 16-bit floating point for key/value cache

use_mmap.description: Use memory mapping for model loading

use_mlock.description: Lock model in memory to prevent swapping

n_gpu_layers.description: Number of layers to offload to the GPU

main_memory_kv.description: Whether key/value cache resides in main memory

max_tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate

top_k.description: Top-k sampling: consider only the top k most likely next tokens

top_p.description: Top-p (nucleus) sampling: consider tokens whose cumulative probability exceeds p

min_p.description: Minimum probability for a token to be considered

goal_impulse.description: Strength of impulse for achieving goals

echo.description: Do not echo the input prompt in the output
